sub_title: Mede eigenaar bij Sani4all Barendrecht & Gouda - op zoek naar nieuw talent!
summary:
Experienced team leader and manager with a great sense for opportunities. Able to devise business strategies and plans that lead to short- and long term improvements. Believes team building and individual coaching are key to success. Able to develop unique training programs to improve sales and communication for small to large businesses.

Others see me as being social, entrepreneurial and goal oriented. I have a positive attitude towards life in general and always seek to help and inspire others. I'm passionate about rock climbing and love to travel.

courses.name: SPG (Single Pitch Guide) - ACIA (Australian Climbing Instructors Association)

profile_positions.description: Proud to manage and co-own two sanitary showrooms together with my brother, located in Barendrecht and Gouda. We help everyone realize their dream bathroom!
profile_positions.title: Co Owner

profile_positions.description:
Proprietor of Cliffhanger Climbing Gym trading as Climbing Peaks. Responsible for the growth and continuity of the business. 

Cliffhanger Climbing Gym is Australia's premier indoor climbing centre, with some of the most diverse walls that are the tallest in the Southern Hemisphere standing at 20 metres.
profile_positions.title: Proprietor

profile_positions.description: Responsible for teaching and overseeing the safety of individuals and groups visiting the climbing centre. Creating training programs and coaching groups of various age categories. Running lead courses and providing lead checks. Route-setting on various types of walls and grades. Partaking in the ongoing maintenance regime, doing monthly inspections for both hard- and software. Responsible for managing the shop at the climbing centre, including making the selection and buying the products on offer.
profile_positions.title: Climbing Instructor

profile_positions.description: Responsible for developing and providing training for all newly hired and existing employees at 23 Amac stores (500+ employees). The training consisted of spoken presentations, organized group exercises with role-playing at its core and a high level of participation from the attendees during the course. The training had the objective to develop the sales skills of employees and create enthusiasm for the company and its most important brand: Apple.
profile_positions.title: Retail Trainer

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the entire operational management of the store. This consisted of, but was not limited to: meeting sales targets, personnel management and planning, managing logistical activities, managing technical services, and most importantly training and coaching a sales team (consisting of about 20 staff members) in cooperation with a floor manager. A high level of independence and initiative is expected from a store manager at Amac. 
 
Apart from my position as a store manager, I was also involved in many other projects, during which, I worked closely with my supervisor to achieve common goals. An example of a project like this was my position as a retail trainer.
profile_positions.title: Store Manager - Amac Amersfoort

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the entire operational management of the store. This consisted of, but was not limited to: meeting sales targets, personnel management and planning, managing logistical activities, managing technical services, and most importantly training and coaching a sales team (consisting of about 10 staff members) in cooperation with a floor manager. A high level of independence and initiative is expected from a store manager at Amac.   Apart from my position as a store manager, I was also involved in many other projects, during which, I worked closely with my supervisor to achieve common goals. An example of a project like this was my position as a retail trainer.
profile_positions.title: Store Manager - Amac Apeldoorn

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the entire operational management of the store. This consisted of, but was not limited to: meeting sales targets, personnel management and planning, managing logistical activities, managing technical services, and most importantly training and coaching a sales team (consisting of about 8 staff members) in cooperation with a floor manager. A high level of independence and initiative is expected from a store manager at Amac.   Apart from my position as a store manager, I was also involved in many other projects, during which, I worked closely with my supervisor to achieve common goals. An example of a project like this was my position as a retail trainer.
profile_positions.title: Store Manager - Amac Deventer

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the customer experience in the store and to provide coaching and support for my colleagues. I was the first point of contact for co-workers when in need of assistance or guidance. On a daily basis, I would be involved with providing customer service, overseeing logistical tasks, dealing with displeased customers and supporting the team (consisting of about 10 staff members) to meet the daily sales targets. A high level of independence and initiative is expected from a floor manager at Amac.
profile_positions.title: Floor Manager - Amac Apeldoorn

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the customer experience in the store and to provide coaching and support for my colleagues. I was the first point of contact for co-workers when in need of assistance or guidance. On a daily basis, I would be involved with providing customer service, overseeing logistical tasks, dealing with displeased customers and supporting the team (consisting of about 6 staff members) to meet the daily sales targets. A high level of independence and initiative is expected from a floor manager at Amac.
profile_positions.title: Floor Manager - Amac Doetinchem

profile_positions.description: Internship at Dutch Items Shanghai, a Dutch company located in Shanghai China. Responsible for doing quality inspections at the factory where products were made. Created a quality control manual to be used for future interns. Furthermore, I assisted the company with store management and retail sales.
profile_positions.title: Internship - Dutch Items Shanghai
